SongName: We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together(Taylor Swift Cover)
Lyric:
[by:叔叔我们不约]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:06.43]I remember when we broke up the first time
[00:09.50]Saying "This is it, I've had enough"
[00:11.68]Cause like
[00:12.52]We hadn't seen each other in a month
[00:14.84]When you said you needed space... What?
[00:18.52]Then you come around again and say
[00:20.68]"Baby, I miss you and I swear I'm gonna change.
[00:23.72]Trust me."
[00:24.51]Remember how that lasted for a day?
[00:26.64]I say "I hate you," we break up, you
[00:30.48]Ooh, we called it off again last night but
[00:36.47]Ooh, this time I'm telling you, I'm telling you...
[00:42.46][00:48.40][01:36.43][01:42.42][02:36.66][02:42.41][03:00.59][03:06.49]We are never ever ever...
[00:46.57][00:52.76][01:40.54][01:46.52][02:40.62][02:46.61][03:04.65][03:10.72]getting back together
[00:54.49][01:48.47][02:48.49][03:12.54]You go talk to your friends,
[00:56.71][01:50.66][02:50.68][03:14.65]talk to my friends, talk to me
[01:00.05][01:54.05][02:54.11][03:18.16]But we are never ever ever ever...
[01:05.47][01:59.31][02:59.32][03:23.33]getting back together.
[01:09.13]Like, ever.
[01:12.46]I'm really gonna miss you picking fights,
[01:14.65]And me falling for it, screaming that I'm right
[01:17.63]And you would hide away and find your peace of mind
[01:20.69]With some indie record that's much cooler than mine
[01:24.43]Ooh, you called me up again tonight but
[01:30.41]Ooh, this time, I'm telling you, I'm telling you
[02:12.51]I used to think that we were forever,
[02:16.96]ever and I used to say "Never say never..."
[02:24.47]SPOKEN: Ughhh...So he calls me up,
[02:26.75]and he's like, "I still love you,"
[02:29.22]and I'm like, I mean
[02:30.44]this is exhausting. You know, like we are never
[02:33.46]getting back together. Like, ever.
